titles.title: Now The Lord Our Souls Has Fed (easy)

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Now the Lord our souls has fed With Himself the Living Bread Fed us sitting at His feet With the finest of the wheat{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}We have endless treasure found We have all things and abound Rich abundance and to spare Shall we not the blesssing share{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}For while we are feasting here Starving millions far and near Call us with the bitter cry Come and help us or we die{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}In this day of full increase Shall we can we hold our peace Staying here we do not well Now then let us go and tell{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Tell how He hath set us free How He leads triumphantly How He satisfies our need How His rest is rest indeed{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Speak for we Thy servants hear Thou hast taught us not to fear And whate'er Thy word shall be We can do it Lord in Thee{/lang-eng}
